main event: An elongated object was sighted in Hertford, North Carolina, on April 5, 1950, by a group of school children and local merchants.
interesting points: The object was described as being longer than an airplane but slimmer, colored a dark metallic gray,It traveled in a southwesterly direction and disappeared from sight in about five minutes,It was said to be about five times the size of a jet fighter and shaped more like a cigar than a conventional aircraft,The object gave off no sound, did not leave a vapor trail, and did not appear to reflect sunlight,Another similar object was sighted about 20 miles away in Woodland at the same time.
sighted object: an elongated dark metallic gray object
witness description: W. Clyde Garrett, Jake Farrell, Mrs. Garland Warren, and a group of school children
